Package org.husky.emed.ch.cda.validation

Class CdaChEmedValidator

java.lang.Object
org.husky.emed.ch.cda.validation.CdaChEmedValidator
@Component @NotThreadSafe public class CdaChEmedValidator extends Object
Validator of the structure of CDA-CH-EMED documents. Two passes are done with the XML Schema and the Schematron definitions.

The XML Schema validation is done with the Java XML library. The Schematron validation is done with ph-schematron.

Author:
Quentin Ligier

  • Constructor Details

    • CdaChEmedValidator

      public CdaChEmedValidator() throws IOException, SAXException, XPathExpressionException
      Constructor.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the XML Schema file is not found.
      SAXException - if the XML Schema document is not valid.
      XPathExpressionException - if the XPath expression is not valid.

  • Method Details

    • prewarm

      public void prewarm()
      Load in memory all schematron XSLT files to optimize the first validation of each type (the XSLT is kept in memory after the first validation). Useful for on-demand validation services.

    • validate

      public void validate(String content, CceDocumentType type) throws Exception
      Validates a CDA-CH-EMED document.
      Parameters:
      content - The CCE document content as a String.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the document content is invalid.
      FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist or is not readable.
      Exception - if the validation raised an exception.

    • validate

      public void validate(File file, CceDocumentType type) throws Exception
      Validates a CDA-CH-EMED document.
      Parameters:
      file - The CCE document content as a File.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the document content is invalid.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      Exception - if the validation raised an exception.

    • validate

      public void validate(InputStream inputStream, CceDocumentType type) throws Exception
      Validates a CDA-CH-EMED document.
      Parameters:
      inputStream - The CDA-CH-EMED document content as an InputStream. It's your responsibility to close it.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the document content is invalid.
      Exception - if the validation raised an exception.

    • validate

      public void validate(DOMSource source, CceDocumentType type) throws Exception
      Validates a CDA-CH-EMED document.
      Parameters:
      source - The CDA-CH-EMED document content as a DOMSource.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the document content is invalid.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the DOMSource doesn't contain a Document.
      Exception - if the validation raised an exception.
